content: every part of the hippopotamus except for the nose is worked in **rounds** - do not join at the end of each round **finished size** approximately 15 cm 5 9 inches **yarn** i use 100% acrylic yarn schachenmayr bravo to be precise you can use whatever yarn and colors work for you **crochet hook** 3 mm **you will also need** * pins * scissors * tapestry needle or needle and thread * 12 mm safety eyes or needle and black thread * toy stuffing **abbreviations and stitches used** * magic_ring * single_crochet = single_crochet * increase = increase * decrease = decrease * back loops only = blo * chain = chain * fasten_off = f/o
